'''''Minecraft: Triple Bundle''''' is a remix album featuring compositions by [[Aaron Cherof]], [[Crispin Hands]], [[Johan Johnson]], [[Peter Hont]], [[Lena Raine]], and [[Kumi Tanioka]] remixed by [[Hyper Potions]]. It was released on March 4, 2025 alongside the release of the [[Minecraft#Purchase and availability|''Minecraft'' Triple Bundle]] offer.<ref>{{ytl|Q9YrS5ue6fQ|Minecraft Triple Bundle|Minecraft|March 4, 2025}}</ref>

== Trivia ==
* "Memories of Dalarna" is a {{wp|future bass}} remix of "[[Comforting Memories]]", "[[MCD:Original Game Soundtrack|Dalarna]]", "[[Relic]]", "The Well of Fate" and "[[MCL:Original Game Soundtrack|A Time of Legends]]".
* "Legends from the Otherside" is a {{wp|happy hardcore}} remix of "[[Otherside]]", "[[MCD:Original Game Soundtrack|Halland]]" and "A Time of Legends".
* "Arch-Illager's Pigstep" is a {{wp|drum and bass}} and {{wp|dubstep}} remix of "[[Pigstep]]", "[[MCD:Original Game Soundtrack|The Arch-Illager]]"  and "[[MCL:Original Game Soundtrack|Burly and Surly]]".
